fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unreveal yourself as the Reverse Unmayor during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will reveal yourself as a Reverse Unmayor at the start of day 1 automatically.
- While revealed, all other living players may whisper and be whispered to, their votes count as -3 votes, and all Town roles with abilities that grant defense without counterattacking are able to and must use those abilities on all living players except you.
- Unrevealing yourself reverses all these effects. *(So does dying.)*
- For all intents and purposes except goals, this is a Town role.
